title: What are some free elo champions for silver?

replies.body: Mid, Top and Jungle if you have, but every role is good.

Mid:

{{champion:103}} Ahri

* She is kind of a jack-of-all trades with her sustain, poke, and pick potential.
* Her Q and ultimate give her a lot of safety through mobility.
* Great at roaming and ganking

{{champion:101}} Xerath

* Strong burst
* fantastic poke and pick potential
* Even against hard matchups you can stay a safe distance away and still farm with abilities (to an extent).
* His ultimate is also helpful because you can pick up kills on enemies that would have escaped fights alive

{{champion:34}} Anivia

* Guardian angel passive helps survive mistakes if it triggers under your tower or near allies
* Powerful CC
* Wall is good for disrupting teamfights
* fairly tanky build path for a mage (lots of HP and shielding)

---
Top:
I dunno, don't play enough of toplane. Quinn vs melees works well if you make good use of her passive marks and use her e to disengage. Fiora is strong. Yorick too.
---

Jungle:

{{champion:254}} Vi

* Strong ganks
* pretty good clear
* good dueler
* flexible (can go tank or diver or even straight damage sometimes)

{{champion:20}} Nunu

* powerful objective control
* good impact in teamfights with his supportive abilities and his ultimate.
* blood boil is really powerful for marksmen, you can use this to really amp up their power in fights

{{champion:154}} Zac

* Great sustain
* Very powerful ganks
* strong disruption in teamfights


{{champion:19}} Warwick

* Good early ganks
* Good sustain
* Great mobility from blood scent
* Flexible build, can go tank or tanky-dps
Ignore nunu and zac.. they are not good in any elo

how to auto win in silver...
{{item:1419}} {{item:1413}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:161}} 

so long ofc you aren't actually a silver player yourself.

for me particularly, vel koz got me out, for the life of them they couldn't dodge E and would get the full combo every time
For me it's usually Ahri and Talon.

There are no "free elo" champions if you mean "something i can suck with and still win". And you still need teamwork, strategy and mechanics knowledge.

Anything you are good at, by putting a ton of work into the champion, is going to win more than something with a 2% above average winrate.
